B

BookAlreadyBorrowedException - Exception in se.lib
Book unable to be borrowed because there is another user already set as borrower.

provides borrowing books by users.

Book of a given title was not found in the database.

provides returning books by users.

G

checks how many times a book was borrowed.

R

se.lib - package se.lib
 

T

TooManyBorrowsException - Exception in se.lib
User has already reached max. number of borrows specified in the system.

U
